((Hold on yes the Ark does have shields and yes they are always on full 
alert. That why the WildCats went up there the first time because the Ark is 
not doing anything but drifting I only need to go up there about once every 
5 to 6 months RPG time because the only power it has going to shields and 
when not under attack a ship of that size should have plenty of power.  
There is also a raduis defense grid space mines, auto guns, satellite 
defense and internal defense grid and The Ark is linked to the Cats Eye 1 
satellite and linked to Void the living Computer back at Cats Layer. So Void 
is kinda the brains behind the Ark which means unless you have passwords and 
codes docking and openning anything would be really impossibile without 
massive amounts of brute force. So can we back it up abit there alot of 
missed defense grids.))

::The 2 WildCat Ships breach earth space and continue toward the Ark::

::Liono::
"Void plot a course through the spaces mine with little to no danger."
